comment: Pretty down-to-earth guy. Explains in details beyond simply just reading off slides. Midterm and Final were 60%, 30% projects, and 10% quizzes. No major complaints besides the projects are a LOT of work, can be done in matlab or py. Highly recommend you get ahead on them as soon as they drop.
rating_tags: Lecture heavy--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: A professor who is caring and always makes every possible way that every student has a chance to pass the class. Gives a lot of extra credit. Student can approach to him even after the class.

The class was overall easy if you come to class. He cares a lot and always makes sure every student has a chance to pass the class. Test can be a little hard but he gives a lot of extra credit. He is really lenient. Just make sure to come to class.

I scared the class before taking it,but now Im passing with A+. I highly recommend if anyone wants to take that class CS3503, CompOrgAr&Arc 3 * 25 Test, yes lock down and webcam. If you follow his pdf slides and lecture, easyA 3 *3.333 HW, if you read and dont miss classes 15% group project or you can do it by yourself, Easy
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures
